name: Legends of Amberland: The Forgotten Crown
overview: Legends of Amberland: The Forgotten Crown is a classic western RPG inspired by dungeon crawlers from the 90s. A fairy tale epic, heroic and humorous, it has a playthrough between 20 to 50 hours with turn-based but fast-paced combat. Discover the secrets behind a mysterious crown and the origin of the spell that made the kingdom forget it ever existed.
